effect.short: Power increases against targets with more HP remaining, up to a maximum of 121 power.
effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Power directly relates to the target's relative remaining HP, given by `1 + 120 * current HP / max HP`, to a maximum of 121.

flavorTexts.text:
The target is crushed with great force. The more HP
the target has left, the greater this move’s power.
